This update introduces our brand-new Today Widget, our long-awaited Workflow Sync service, and many other new features!

With the Today Widget, you can quickly run workflows from any app by just pulling down Notification Center. Workflow Sync keeps

This update introduces our brand-new Today Widget, our long-awaited Workflow Sync service, and many other new features!

With the Today Widget, you can quickly run workflows from any app by just pulling down Notification Center. Workflow Sync keeps

Workflow 1.4.1 fixes a bunch of issues, including:
• Fixed an issue where Open App, Call, Add to Launch Center, and other URL-based features could fail on iOS 9
• Fixed an issue where workflows may not sync from iPhone to the Apple Watch app
• Fi

Workflow 1.4.1 fixes a bunch of issues, including:
• Fixed an issue where Open App, Call, Add to Launch Center, and other URL-based features could fail on iOS 9
• Fixed an issue where workflows may not sync from iPhone to the Apple Watch app
• Fi

Workflow 1.4.2 is optimized for iPad Pro! We also added two new actions and made bunch of other improvements.

Here’s what’s new:
• Added two new actions: Create Note and Post to WordPress
• Save File and Get File can now retrieve and save fil

Workflow 1.4.3 lets you use Bursts and Live Photos in your workflows, and includes a bunch of other improvements! On behalf of the entire Workflow team, we wish you a happy holiday season full of merry automation.

Here’s what’s new:
· Make GIFs

Workflow 1.4.3 lets you use Bursts and Live Photos in your workflows, and includes a bunch of other improvements! On behalf of the entire Workflow team, we wish you a happy holiday season full of merry automation.

Here’s what’s new:
· Make GIFs

Workflow 1.4.4 squashes bugs all over the place. We added a few new actions, too!

Here’s what’s new:
· New actions to overlay images on top of images, unzip files, and generate Markdown from rich text - and more!
· Save with Transmit now supp

Workflow 1.4.4 squashes bugs all over the place. We added a few new actions, too!

Here’s what’s new:
· New actions to overlay images on top of images, unzip files, and generate Markdown from rich text - and more!
· Save with Transmit now supp

Workflow 1.4.5 adds a Send via DeskConnect action. DeskConnect lets you send links, documents pictures, and everything else between your devices with a tap. Check it out on the App Store!

We also improved the speed and reliability Workflow for Appl

Workflow 1.4.5 adds a Send via DeskConnect action. DeskConnect lets you send links, documents pictures, and everything else between your devices with a tap. Check it out on the App Store!

We also improved the speed and reliability Workflow for Appl

We’re excited to bring you Workflow 1.5, our next major update! Here’s what’s new:

• We rebuilt the Workflow Composer from scratch, meaning building and running workflows is smoother than ever before.
• We added 22 new actions! Now your workflow

We’re excited to bring you Workflow 1.5, our next major update! Here’s what’s new:

• We rebuilt the Workflow Composer from scratch, meaning building and running workflows is smoother than ever before.
• We added 22 new actions! Now your workflow

Workflow 1.5.1 introduces IFTTT integration, allowing you to trigger IFTTT recipes in your workflows. With IFTTT's hundreds of actions now accessible from Workflow, the possibilities are endless!

We also squashed a bunch of bugs and added actions f

Workflow 1.5.1 introduces IFTTT integration, allowing you to trigger IFTTT recipes in your workflows. With IFTTT's hundreds of actions now accessible from Workflow, the possibilities are endless!

We also squashed a bunch of bugs and added actions f

Workflow 1.5.2 is built for iOS 10. Here's what's new:

• Workflow's widget has been redesigned from the ground up for iOS 10
• Use the power of speech recognition in your workflows with the new Dictate Text action
• Added actions for Ass

Workflow 1.5.2 is built for iOS 10. Here's what's new:

• Workflow's widget has been redesigned from the ground up for iOS 10
• Use the power of speech recognition in your workflows with the new Dictate Text action
• Added actions for Ass

Workflow 1.5.3 lets you use any web API from your workflows! Check out the updated Get Contents of URL action. The possibilities are endless.

There's also a bunch of bug fixes, support for new archive formats (hello, cpio), and more. See the full l

Workflow 1.6 introduces the new Workflow Gallery, the best way to discover fresh, hand-picked workflows from the community. With the new Gallery, it's easier than ever to get started with Workflow.

See the full list of changes at http://workflow.is

Workflow 1.6 introduces the new Workflow Gallery, the best way to discover fresh, hand-picked workflows from the community. With the new Gallery, it's easier than ever to get started with Workflow.

See the full list of changes at http://workflow.is

Workflow 1.6.1 adds a new "Recently Added" section so you can explore the newest, freshest workflows. We also added actions for Bear and Opener, and added support for Sleep, Reproductive Health, and Mindfulness logging in Log Health Sample.

Workflow 1.7.2 includes updated file actions, with expanded support for Box, Dropbox, and iCloud Drive. And you can now get the contents of sheets in Ulysses. We fixed a lot of bugs, too.

Learn more and see the full release notes at http://workflow

Workflow 1.7.2 includes updated file actions, with expanded support for Box, Dropbox, and iCloud Drive. And you can now get the contents of sheets in Ulysses. We fixed a lot of bugs, too.

Learn more and see the full release notes at http://workflow

全新的「捷徑」App 讓您只要點一下或要求 Siri，即可以製作能執行多項步驟的個人化捷徑。

* 將捷徑加入 Siri，即可用語音執行捷徑
* 支援「Siri 捷徑」的 App 中有更多可用的新動作
* Siri 現在會在鎖定畫面和「搜尋」中向您建議經常使用的捷徑
* Siri 會根據您經常和最近使用的 App 來建議加入到「捷徑」的動作
* 使用新的動作，如「設定 Wi-Fi」、「設定低耗電模式」和「設定勿擾模式」來更改系統設定
* 使用新的付款動作來使用

全新的「捷徑」App 讓您只要點一下或要求 Siri，即可以製作能執行多項步驟的個人化捷徑。

* 將捷徑加入 Siri，即可用語音執行捷徑
* 支援「Siri 捷徑」的 App 中有更多可用的新動作
* Siri 現在會在鎖定畫面和「搜尋」中向您建議經常使用的捷徑
* Siri 會根據您經常和最近使用的 App 來建議加入到「捷徑」的動作
* 使用新的動作，如「設定 Wi-Fi」、「設定低耗電模式」和「設定勿擾模式」來更改系統設定
* 使用新的付款動作來使用

•使用新的「取得目前天氣狀況」和「取得天氣預報」動作來在捷徑中使用最新的天氣資訊
•使用新的「製作鬧鐘」、「切換鬧鐘」和「啟動計時器」動作來設定鬧鐘和計時器
•使用新的「測量」和「轉換測量」動作來在多種單位之間轉換
•使用「取得最新輸入的項目」動作來取得從「照片」App 輸入的最新照片
•當您從 HomePod 使用 Siri 來執行捷徑時，媒體現在會使用 AirPlay 自動從 HomePod 播放
•錯誤修正

請參訪 https://support.appl

•使用新的「取得目前天氣狀況」和「取得天氣預報」動作來在捷徑中使用最新的天氣資訊
•使用新的「製作鬧鐘」、「切換鬧鐘」和「啟動計時器」動作來設定鬧鐘和計時器
•使用新的「測量」和「轉換測量」動作來在多種單位之間轉換
•使用「取得最新輸入的項目」動作來取得從「照片」App 輸入的最新照片
•當您從 HomePod 使用 Siri 來執行捷徑時，媒體現在會使用 AirPlay 自動從 HomePod 播放
•錯誤修正

請參訪 https://support.appl
錯誤修正和改進內容

•「捷徑」現已為新的 iPad Pro 最佳化
• 修正錯誤

請於下列網站瞭解更多資訊和檢視更動列表：https://support.apple.com/zh-tw/HT209087

• 修正錯誤

請於下列網站瞭解更多資訊和檢視更動列表：https://support.apple.com/zh-tw/HT209087

瞭解更多資訊並檢視完整的更動列表，請參訪此網站： https://support.apple.com/zh-tw/HT209087
• 錯誤修正並改進功能
• 錯誤修正並改進功能

• 使用新的「製作備忘錄」、「附加到備忘錄」、「尋找備忘錄」和「顯示備忘錄」動作來製作和取用捷徑中的備忘錄
• 使用新的「從輸入項目取得數字」動作來擷取文字內的數字
• 現在於「資料庫」標籤頁上點一下將可捲動到捷徑列表的底部
• 「取得路程時間」現可傳回更多詳細資訊，包含路線名稱、抵達時間和距離
• 錯誤修正和改進內容
